mn85:4.3: bodhi kho → bodhi bho gotama (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn85:12.2: upasampajja viharāmīti pavedesī’ti → upasampajja pavedesīti (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn85:12.23: attano → idaṁ padaṁ bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed potthakesu | attanā → attano (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
mn85:12.28: āvuso → āvuso rāma (bj, sya-all, km, mr)
mn85:22.5: muddhani abhimattheyya → muddhānaṁ ūhananti (bj); muddhānaṁ abhimattheyya (sya-all, km); muddhānaṁ abhimantheyya (pts1ed)
mn85:26.6: arahato evarūpo hotī’ti → vihārotveveso arahato ti, Vihāro tveva so → vihārotveveso (bj)
mn85:27.5: ajjhohāressāma → ajjhoharissāma (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn85:27.7: ajajjitaṁ → ajaddhukaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, km, pts1ed); ajjukaṁ (cck) | ajjhohāreyyuṁ → ajjhohareyyuṁ (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn85:44.21: aṇaṇa → anaṇa (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed, mr)
mn85:44.22: Desassu → desessu (cck); desetu (sya1ed, sya2ed, km, mr)
mn85:49.21: Andhībhūtasmiṁ → andhabhūtasmiṁ (bj, cck, pts1ed); andhabhūtasmi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
mn85:49.27: tasmāhamupaka → tasmāhaṁ upakā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn85:49.28: hupeyyapāvuso’ti → huveyya pāvusoti (bj, pts1ed); huveyyāvusoti (sya-all, km)
mn85:55.5: aṅkusagayhe → aṅkusagaṇhe (sya-all, km) | hatthārūḷhe → hatthāruyhe (bj); haṭṭhārūyhe (pts1ed)
